    • Constructor Detail

      • DFSM

        public DFSM(java.lang.String encoding)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Builds a DFSM from a string representation (encoding)
        Parameters:
        encoding - the string representation of a DFSM
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the encoding is incorrect or if it does not represent a deterministic machine

      • DFSM

        public DFSM(java.util.Set<State> states,
            Alphabet alphabet,
            java.util.Set<Transition> transitions,
            State initialState,
            java.util.Set<State> acceptingStates)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Build a DFSM from its components
        Parameters:
        states - the set of states for this machine
        alphabet - this machine's alphabet
        transitions - the transition mapping of this machine
        initialState - the initial state (must be a member of states)
        acceptingStates - the set of accepting states (must be a subset of states)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the components do not represent a deterministic machine

    • Method Detail

      • minimize

        public DFSM minimize()
        Returns a minimal version of this state machine
        Returns:
        a DFSM that recognizes the same language as this machine, but has a minimal number of states.

      • compute

        public boolean compute(java.lang.String input)
        Returns true if and only if input belongs to this machine's language.
        Overrides:
        compute in class NDFSM
        Parameters:
        input - a string whose characters are members of this machine's alphabet
        Returns:
        a boolean that indicates if the input is a member of this machine's language or not

                throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
